snippet: A batch of illegally distilled alcohol has killed seven people, hospitalized dozens and blinded several others in the southern city of Rafsanjan.
abstract: Seven Iranians die and dozens more are sent to the hospital after drinking a batch of illegally distilled alcohol in southern city of Rafsanjan.
lead_paragraph: A batch of illegally distilled alcohol has killed seven people, hospitalized dozens and blinded several others in the southern city of Rafsanjan.

headline.seo: Seven Die in Iran After Drinking Homemade Alcohol
headline.main: Seven Die in Iran After Drinking Homemade Alcohol
headline.print_headline: Seven Die in Iran After Drinking Homemade Alcohol
